distribution.iterations: v.px = -16;v.pz = -16;v.p0x = math.random(-8,8);v.p0z = math.random(-8,8);v.p1x = math.random(-8,8);v.p1z = math.random(-8,8);v.p2x = math.random(-8,8);v.p2z = math.random(-8,8);v.p3x = math.random(-8,8);v.p3z = math.random(-8,8);v.ox = v.originx;v.oz = v.originz;return (v.originx*v.originx + v.originz*v.originz > 500*500) && (q.noise(v.originx/2048, v.originz/2048) > math.sin((0.5 - 0.3)*180));
